name: The Apache
declaringWar: You've encroached on our lands for far too long!
attacked: You will never destroy our way of life!
defeated: You have worn out my people enough... that I must, surrender...
introduction: As long as you don't hurt my people, and don't steal our land, we'll have no issues.
hateHello: You are an evil that walks the earth.
tradeRequest: Will you accept this offer?
uniqueName: Once They Moved Like the Wind
uniques: No movement cost to pillage
Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills <when at war>
[+10]% Strength <for [{Military} {Land}] units> <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>

name: The Purépecha
declaringWar: The time has come for you to join us.
attacked: You will be killed for your treachery
introduction: Greetings traveler. I am Tariácuri, and I have been sent by the gods to form a unified Purépecha state.
tradeRequest: Would you accept this offer friend?
uniques: Starts with [Mining]
[-10]% construction time for [Mine] improvements

name: Lan Xang
declaringWar: It is with great regret that I must inform you we are at war.
attacked: I will defend my kingdom against invaderssuch as yourself!
introduction: Greetings, we hope you are a peaceful people. I am Fa Ngum, King of Lan Xang Hôm Khao.
hateHello: Please leave, we don't want you to cause any disturbances.
tradeRequest: Would any of our offers interest you?
uniqueName: One Million Elephants and a White Parasol
uniques: [+50]% Natural religion spread [in annexed cities]

name: The Philippines
declaringWar: The engaging of this warfare is not only desirable, but absolutely essential to the welfare of the Philippine Islands
attacked: The Philippine Islands will not fall!
defeated: Your conquest of this land will go down as a great treachery in the history of the world. Of this, I am sure
introduction: Good day, I am Emilio Aguinaldo, President of the great Philippine Islands. What business have you here?
hateHello: Your treachery does not go unnoticed.
tradeRequest: What do you say to this?
uniques: [+10]% [Faith] [in all cities] <upon declaring friendship> <for [4] turns>
[+15]% [Culture] [in all cities] <upon entering a Golden Age> <for [4] turns>
[+1 Faith] in cities on [Coastal] tiles <upon discovering [Astronomy] technology>

name: Francia
declaringWar: It is necessary now that you must join us.
attacked: You now will face the full might of the Lord and my army!
defeated: If the Lord wills it. I'll accept this defeat.
introduction: Welcome to the Kingdom of the Franks, I am Charlemagne, and I protect my people.
tradeRequest: Would you accept this offer my friend?
uniques: Empire enters a [4]-turn Golden Age <upon entering a new era>
[+10]% [Culture] [in all cities connected to capital]

name: Teotihuacan
declaringWar: Put up little resistance and I may spare more of your people.
attacked: You finally decided to join your ancestors?
defeated: As we lay defeated, our legacy will go down in history. When the last word of your history is spoken, our temples shall still be standing.
introduction: What's this? Another state to join my empire, or a useful ally? Respect my power, and be welcome.
hateHello: You are brave to come here.
tradeRequest: You have something that belongs to me, give it now.
uniques: [+1] population [in this city] <upon constructing [Wonder]>
Allied City-States provide [Food] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Production] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Gold] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Culture] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Faith] equal to [10]% of what they produce for themselves

name: Estonia
declaringWar: Your very existence is a threat to Estonian freedom, you must be destroyed!
defeated: All the years I have spent fighting for my people, just to lose independence once more...`
introduction: We welcome you with open arms, just respect our nation and we shall do the same.
hateHello: I will cooperate with you still, just know, I don't respect you.
tradeRequest: What would you like for this?
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every [Forest]
[+10]% Strength <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

name: Latvia
declaringWar: This is necessary, not for me, nor for my allies, but for my people, so they may live to see another day of freedom.
attacked: I only do what is right for Latvia, if that means conquering you then so be it.
defeated: I surrender on the terms I remain in my place and you remain in yours, it is with hope that you
introduction: I will welcome you, but you must remember, Latvia is for Latvians.
neutralHello: Latvia's sun shines equally over everyone.
hateHello: You? What are you doing here?
tradeRequest: This may benefit the both of us, do you accept?
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every specialist [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness] from every specialist [in all cities] <during a Golden Age>
Instantly gain [+15] [Golden Age points] <upon expending a [Great Person] unit> <(modified by game speed)>

name: Zaire
declaringWar: We are seeking our own authenticity, and we will find it because we wish, even if that means fighting you for it.
attacked: War? I have rendered my country and people an enormous service. They owe me everything, they will die defending my country.
defeated: I am the latest victim of your nation, no longer needed by you, but I am defeated knowing my people died for me.
introduction: The chief is the chief. He is the eagle who flies high and cannot be touched by the spit of the toad. I am he, the chief, President Mobutu. Are you the toad?
neutralHello: What business do you have here?
hateHello: Does my support for you count for nothing?
tradeRequest: In a word, everything is for sale, my country needs this, what is your price?
uniques: [+1 Culture, +2 Production] per [3] social policies adopted
[+10]% Strength <vs [Melee] units> <in [your] tiles>

name: Libertatia
declaringWar: Fer the good o' the people, yer tyranny must end!
defeated: I die knowin' I fought fer a good cause...
introduction: I be Captain James Misson, vigilant guardian o' the people's rights an' liberties. Tell me, be ye oppressors, or the poor souls they trample?
neutralHello: How fare ye this fine evenin'?
hateHello: Leave this place, 'less ye wish t' perish.
tradeRequest: Got meself a fine offer fer yer consideration.
uniques: Adopt [Freedom] <upon entering the [Industrial era]>
[+20]% Production when constructing [Water] units [in all coastal cities]
Earn [50]% of killed [{Military} {Water}] unit's [Strength] as [Golden Age points]

name: The Buccaneers
declaringWar: Ye might as well give up now, 'fore it gets worse!
attacked: I'll send ye t' Davy Jones' Locker!
defeated: Come on then, ye cowards! I'll take ye all meself!
introduction: Ahoy, there! Name's Captain Henry Morgan. Be ye a great ally... or a foe worth crossin'?
hateHello: What be yer purpose here, ye scurvy dog?
tradeRequest: Be smart now, matey. Take the deal.
uniques: [+25]% Yield from pillaging tiles
Earn [15]% of the damage done to [City] units as [Gold]
Earn [25]% of killed [{Military} {Water}] unit's [Strength] as [Gold]

name: Wokou
declaringWar: Your lands will soon be mine!
attacked: I see you are stupid, let's see how long until your nation collapses...
defeated: I will negotiate with you, one last time...
introduction: You have found the base of the fearsome Wokou. If you decide to be peaceful, we shall have no issues. If you decide to be hostile... you will come to fear our fleet.
tradeRequest: There are ways of making people accept deals. You will accept this one, unless you want me to use other methods.
uniques: [+10]% Strength <when fighting in [Coastal] tiles>
[{Military} {Land}] units gain the [Wako Raider] promotion
[1] Movement point cost to embark <starting from the [Renaissance era]>

name: Canton Pirates
declaringWar: Do you think you can stand against the power of the full Red Flag Fleet? Let us see.
attacked: I will have no problems ending your worthless life.
defeated: You have won, I surrender to you.. I will live peacefully under your rule.
introduction: I am Ching Shih, leader of the Pirate Confederation, chief of the Red Flag Fleet. Now who are you?
neutralHello: Have you come to tell me something?
hateHello: Get out of the way, I'm busy.
tradeRequest: I have other ways of getting this...
uniques: [3] Unit Supply per [6] population [in puppeted cities]
[2] Unit Supply per [6] population [in annexed cities]
All newly-trained [Water] units [in all coastal cities] receive the [Raider] promotion <during a Golden Age>

name: Tétouan
declaringWar: I have come to take revenge on you, infidel!
attacked: You wish to make us flee further? Come on then.
defeated: I will never forget nor forgive this humiliation.
introduction: My name is Sayyida al-Hurra, a free woman and Governor of Tétouan. Do you stand in my way?
hateHello: You must be wiser than this.
tradeRequest: There are ways I can get this without your permission.
uniqueName: Pirate Queen of the Western Seas
uniques: [Water] units gain the [Coastal Raider I] promotion
[+1 Gold, +1 Faith] from every specialist [in all cities]
[+15]% Strength <for [Military] units> <in cities with a [foreign] religion>

name: Goths
attacked: I have faced mightier men than you!
defeated: My empire has fallen... it is only a matter of time until yours does too.
introduction: Greetings mighty warrior, do well on keeping peace with us, for many cities have fallen before me.
hateHello: You will be seeing us again...
tradeRequest: Consider this offer.
uniques: Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities

name: Timurid Empire
declaringWar: Prepare to become one with my empire!
attacked: I had already planned your demise years in advance!
defeated: Only luck can explain your victory.
introduction: You stand before Timur the Great, how long until you join my empire?
hateHello: If you want to fight you won't win.
tradeRequest: Trade with me.

attacked: You will fall like all our enemies before you!
defeated: I knew this day would come. Make it quick.
introduction: I, the Great Sultan of the Seljuk Empire, grant you visitation.
